channel.title: Oracle Identity Governance on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Identity Governance on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Review the latest changes and known issues for Oracle Identity Governance on Kubernetes. Recent changes Date Version Change July, 2022 22.3.1 Supports Oracle Identity Governance 12.2.1.4 domain deployment using the July 2022 container image which contains the July Patch Set Update (PSU) and other fixes released with the Critical Patch Update (CPU) program. April, 2022 22.2.1 Updated for CRI-O support. November, 2021 21.
